instruction: Compose a tweet about solar energy using at least two facts about solar energy from the following data set.
input:
Solar_Fact_1:
Solar energy can reduce your electricity bill.
Solar_Fact_2:
The United States had more than 64 gigawatts (GW) of solar photovoltaic (PV) installed capacity in 2019.
output: Did you know that solar energy can reduce your electricity bill and that the United States had more than 64 Gigawatts of #Solar power installed in 2019? #RenewableEnergy #GoGreen
